snippet.title: Wuthering Waves · Dev Talk · Prelude EP.3 - Art Design
snippet.description:
Dear Rovers,

This episode of "Wuthering Waves · Dev Talk · Prelude" - EP. 3, we take a dive into the mindset of our Art Designers and learn, to present a world unique in its own, how their inspirations for Art Styles, Scenic Designs, and Item Designs gradually came into fruition.

Heed the Prelude.  

Pre-register for the game:
https://wutheringwaves.kurogame.com/en

♦ Check out our other official links
Official Website: https://wutheringwaves.kurogame.com/en
Official Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Wuthering-Waves-108346541748778
Official Discord: https://discord.gg/wutheringwaves 
Official Twitter: https://twitter.com/Wuthering_Waves
Official Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/WutheringWaves

#WutheringWaves
